snapshotter.auth.server_entry module#

async snapshotter.auth.server_entry.add_api_key(api_key_request: AddApiKeyRequest, email: str, request: Request, response: Response)#
async snapshotter.auth.server_entry.create_update_user(request: Request, user_cu_request: AppOwnerModel, response: Response)#

can be used for both creating a new entity or updating an entity’s information in the redis htable

async snapshotter.auth.server_entry.get_all_users(request: Request, response: Response)#
async snapshotter.auth.server_entry.get_user_details(request: Request, response: Response, email: str)#
